post.desc: The Lease Container operation establishes and manages a lock on a container for delete operations. The lock duration can be 15 to 60 seconds, or can be infinite.

200.desc: OK -- Lease Container operation completed successfully.

get.desc: Lists all containers and does not support a prefix like data plane. Also SRP today does not return continuation token.

200.desc: OK -- List Container operation completed successfully.

put.desc: Creates a new container under the specified account as described by request body. The container resource includes metadata and properties for that container. It does not include a list of the blobs contained by the container.

params.name: blobContainer
params.desc: Properties of the blob container to create.

201.desc: Created -- Create Container operation completed successfully.

patch.desc: Updates container properties as specified in request body. Properties not mentioned in the request will be unchanged. Update fails if the specified container doesn't already exist.

params.name: blobContainer
params.desc: Properties to update for the blob container.

200.desc: OK -- Update Container operation completed successfully.

sch.desc: Properties of the updated blob container.

get.desc: Gets properties of a specified container.

200.desc: OK -- Get Container operation completed successfully.

delete.desc: Deletes specified container under its account.

200.desc: OK -- Delete Container operation completed successfully.

204.desc: No Content -- The Container not exist.
